mapper.select: SELECT openf.lottery_fill_open_id, openf.lottery_fill_creater_date, openf.lottery_fill_end_date, openf.fill_l_bi as totalQty, openf.award_l_bi, openf.send_status, openf.lottery_fill_unit_price, openf.lottery_stage, openf.lottery_fill_name, openf.lottery_type_id, openf.create_user_id, openf.open_number, openf.status, openf.award_user_id SUM(userf.lottery_fill_buy_qty) AS overBuyQty FROM lottery_fill_open openf JOIN lottery_fill_user userf ON userf.lottery_fill_open_id = openf.lottery_fill_open_id AND userf.lottery_fill_status = '1' WHERE openf.lottery_fill_open_id = #{fOpenId}

SELECT count(*) FROM lottery_fill_open AS fopen INNER JOIN lottery_type AS type ON fopen.lottery_type_id = type.lottery_type_id INNER JOIN lottery_fill_user AS fuser ON fopen.lottery_fill_open_id = fuser.lottery_fill_open_id LEFT JOIN lottery_clazz AS clazz ON clazz.lottery_clazz_id = type.lottery_clazz_id
fopen.open_number IS NULL AND type.lottery_type_id = #{lotteryTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT fopen.lottery_fill_open_id, fopen.open_number, fopen.lottery_fill_creater_date, fopen.lottery_fill_end_date, fopen.create_user_id, fopen.fill_l_bi, fopen.award_l_bi, fopen.send_status, fopen.lottery_fill_unit_price, fopen.lottery_type_id, fopen.lottery_fill_name, fopen.lottery_stage, fopen.status, fopen.award_user_id, fuser.lottery_fill_buy_qty AS userBuyQty FROM manifest_expend mexpend INNER JOIN lottery_fill_user fuser ON mexpend.lottery_id = fuser.lottery_fill_user_id INNER JOIN lottery_fill_open fopen ON fuser.lottery_fill_open_id = fopen.lottery_fill_open_id WHERE mexpend.doc_no = #{docNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
